properties.name: Expand
properties.help: The properties to include in the results. For example, use &$expand=metadata in the query string to retrieve resource provider metadata. To include property aliases in response, use $expand=resourceTypes/aliases.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Wait
properties.help: Wait for the registration to finish.
